tagline: Your premier destination for comfortable stays and professional event hosting. Secure your booking with ease.
languagesSupported: Interface available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.
selectDateRangePrompt: Select your desired check-in and check-out dates to see available dormitories.
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
enterEmployer: Enter your employer or institution name
fillFormToBookDormitory: Fill out the form below to request a booking for the selected dormitory.
itemNotFound: The requested item could not be found.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: There was an error fetching the dormitory details. Please try again.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received and is pending payment verification. Please proceed with payment.
errorSavingBooking: There was an error saving your booking. Please try again.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate the price. Please check item details or contact support.
fillFormToBookFacility: Complete the form to request a booking for the selected hall or section.
anySpecialRequests: Enter any special requests or additional notes here (max 500 characters).
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been received and is pending approval by our team.
errorSubmittingBooking: There was an error submitting your booking. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompany: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
pleaseSelectSectionsToBook: Please select one or more sections to book.
loginAsCompanyToBook: You need to be logged in as an approved company representative to book.
errorFetchingHallsAndSections: Failed to load halls and sections. Please try refreshing the page.
noItemsAvailable: No halls or sections are currently listed as available.
fillFormToBookSelectedSections: Complete the form below to book the selected meeting sections.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book a hall or section.
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
pageNotFoundMessage: Oops! The page you are looking for does not exist. It might have been moved or deleted.
searchDormitories: Search by room number or floor...
viewAndManageDormitories: View and manage all registered dormitories.
confirmDeleteDormitoryMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this dormitory? This action cannot be undone.
noDormitoriesFoundPleaseAdd: No dormitories found. Please add a new dormitory to get started.
noDormitoriesMatchSearch: No dormitories match your search criteria.
viewAndManageHallsAndSections: View and manage all halls and meeting sections.
name: Name
confirmDeleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
noHallsFoundPleaseAdd: No halls or sections found. Please add a new one to get started.
noHallsMatchSearch: No halls or sections match your search criteria.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval by an administrator.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use. Please try a different email or log in.
noBookingsMatchSearch: No bookings match your search criteria.
bankDetailsForPaymentVerification: Use these details for payment verification and reference.
adminPaymentReferenceNote: This information is for admin reference for payment verification. Ensure clients are provided correct details separately if needed.
searchBookings: Search by ID, name, email, category...
noBookingsFoundAdmin: No bookings found matching your criteria. Try adjusting filters or check back later.
noActiveBookingsFoundAdmin: No active bookings found at the moment.
viewAndManageActiveBookings: View and manage all current and upcoming bookings.
confirmDeleteBookingMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this booking? This action cannot be undone.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter or paste custom agreement terms here. These will override the default terms if provided.
editTermsNote: These terms will be included in the generated agreement. If left blank, default terms will be used.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement is not applicable or ready for this type of booking or its current status.
errorFetchingBookingDetails: Error fetching booking details for agreement.
noBookingIdProvided: No booking ID was provided to generate the agreement.
clientAddressPlaceholder: [Client's Address or N/A if not applicable for {companyName}]
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon booking confirmation unless otherwise agreed in writing. Overdue payments may result in cancellation.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made X days prior to the event date will receive a Y% refund. No refunds for cancellations within Z days.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Responsibilities: Client is responsible for any damages to the facility or equipment caused by their guests or staff. The Service Provider is responsible for providing the agreed-upon facilities and services in good working order.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: The Service Provider is not liable for loss or damage to personal property of the Client or their guests. Client agrees to indemnify the Service Provider against any claims arising from their use of the facility.
superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Super Administrators.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Administrators or Super Administrators.
keyholderOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by Keyholders.
registerAdminDescription: Create a new administrator account. Only Super Admins can perform this action.
adminRegisteredMessage: Administrator account for {email} has been successfully created.
weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters long.
searchCompanies: Search by company name, contact, or email...
viewAndApproveCompanies: View registered companies and manage their approval status.
companyStatusUpdated: Company ({companyId}) approval status has been set to {status}.
noCompaniesMatchSearch: No companies match your search criteria.
keyholderDashboardMessage: Manage dormitory key assignments and view daily activity reports.
searchByNamePhoneId: Search by guest name, phone, or booking ID...
manageKeyAssignmentsForGuests: Manage key issuance and return for guests with paid dormitory bookings.
noPaidDormBookingsForKeyAssignment: No paid and approved dormitory bookings found requiring key assignment.
noBookingsMatchKeyholderSearch: No bookings match your search. Ensure the booking is for a dormitory, paid, and approved.
errorFetchingDormBookingsForKeyholder: Failed to fetch dormitory bookings for key assignment.
noKeyActivityForDate: No key activity recorded for the selected date.
dailyReportFeaturePlaceholder: The daily report generation feature is under development. Please check back later.
selectDateRangeForReports: Select a date range to generate reports.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Choose a report type and use the date range selected above.
viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print periodic dormitory booking data.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a start and end date for the report range first.
noDataForReport: No data available for this report and selected date range.
yourActiveBookingsDescription: View and manage your company's active and upcoming facility bookings.
noActiveBookingsFound: You have no active bookings. Start by reserving a hall or section.
agreementUploadedSuccessfully: Your signed agreement has been uploaded and the booking status updated.
errorUploadingAgreementActual: An error occurred while uploading your agreement. Please try again.
agreementPreparationPending: Agreement is being prepared by admin.
errorFetchingYourBookings: Failed to fetch your bookings. Please try again.
loginAsCompanyToBook: You need to be logged in as an approved company representative to perform this action.
pleaseSelectItemsToBook: Please select one or more items to book.
selectMultipleDescription: Choose one or more halls and/or sections from the list below to book them together in a single transaction.
noItemsCurrentlyAvailableForSelection: No items are currently available for selection.
loginToBookMultipleDesc: To select and book multiple items, please log in as an approved company representative.
noValidItemsForBooking: No valid items were selected or available for booking. Please try again.
itemNotAvailableErrorMultiBook: The item '{itemName}' is currently not available and has been removed from your selection.
itemNotFoundDatabase: Item '{itemName}' was not found in our records and has been removed from your selection.
errorFetchingItemDetailsMulti: Error fetching details for item '{itemName}'. It has been removed from your selection.
noItemsSelectedForBooking: No items were selected for booking. Please go back and select items.
fillFormToBookSelectedItems: Complete the form to request a booking for the selected facilities.
accountPendingApprovalMultiBook: Your company account is still pending approval. You will be able to book multiple items once your account is approved.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this agreement.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: Access Denied. This agreement does not belong to your company or is not available.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing or is not applicable.
yourSignedAgreementUploaded: Your signed agreement has been uploaded.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: After making the transfer, please send a screenshot of your payment confirmation along with your Booking ID ({bookingId}) to our Telegram bot for verification.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Important: After making the transfer, please send a screenshot of your payment confirmation along with your Booking ID ({bookingId}) to our Telegram bot for verification. Ensure your phone number used for Telegram matches the one on your booking if applicable.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your payment via bank transfer.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the payment, send a screenshot of your transaction receipt and your Booking ID to our Telegram bot: {botUsername}. If you provided a phone number during booking ({phoneNumber}), our admin may also contact you there for confirmation.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: Once your payment proof is received, an admin will verify it and update your booking status.
missingBookingId: Missing booking ID. Cannot display payment details.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking or has already been processed.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Room {roomNumber} is currently marked as unavailable by administration. Please select another room or contact us.
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a date range to view available dormitories.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: Sorry, no dormitories are available for the selected date range. Please try different dates.
noDormitoriesConfigured: No dormitories are currently configured in the system.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
errorCheckingAvailability: An error occurred while checking availability. Please try again or contact support.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: All beds in {roomName} are booked for the selected dates.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: {itemName} is currently marked as unavailable by administration. It cannot be booked.
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is already booked or pending for some or all of the selected dates.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: Dormitory capacity is not configured correctly. Cannot check availability.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please contact support if this issue persists.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your booking is being processed. Please ensure you have sent your payment proof via Telegram for verification.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you! Your booking request for the facility has been received and will be reviewed by our team shortly. We will contact you regarding payment and agreement details once approved.
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status and details of your active dormitory booking using your phone number.
enterPhoneNumberPrompt: Enter phone number used for booking
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings. Please try again.
noActiveBookingsFoundForPhone: No active or upcoming approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the channels below for inquiries, support, or feedback.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For specific inquiries related to dormitory rooms within these buildings:
generalInquiriesDesc: For all other questions, facility bookings, or technical support:
addressPlaceholder: Oromia Education Training Center, Main Campus, [City, Region]
mapPlaceholder: Google Maps embed will be here.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code below with your phone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our facilities and services.
scanForBrochureDesc: Get quick access to our services overview.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Secure, well-maintained dormitory rooms for individuals and groups, available for short and long-term stays.
brochureHallsDesc: Modern, well-equipped halls and meeting sections suitable for conferences, workshops, training sessions, and events of various sizes.
brochureCateringDesc: Optional catering services including lunch and refreshments to complement your event or stay, with multiple quality tiers.
brochureAboutUsContent: {siteName} is dedicated to providing high-quality accommodation and event facilities. We aim to offer a seamless booking experience and excellent service to all our clients, supporting educational and professional activities in the region.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and much more to ensure a productive and comfortable experience!
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated support and excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: Commitment to quality and guest satisfaction.
brochureCallToActionTitle: Get in Touch or Book Today!
brochureCallToActionDesc: We look forward to hosting you or your event. Contact us for more information or proceed to book online.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page is no longer in use. Please use the new booking and payment process.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This phone number will be used for Telegram bot payment identification.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: Optional. If provided, this phone can be used for Telegram payment identification.
errorCalculatingTotalCostNaN: Error calculating total cost. Please review your selections.
dateRangeRequired: Date range is required for booking.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Our records show you already have a pending or approved dormitory booking for today using this phone number. You cannot make another dormitory booking for the same day.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (Firestore index) is required to perform this check efficiently. Please contact support or an administrator.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: The check for existing bookings could not be completed due to a missing database index. Your booking request will proceed, but please ensure you do not have duplicate bookings.
individualUserNote: Note: Individual users (not representing a company) should proceed to book dormitories directly. Company registration is for facility bookings.
